text: Skilled therapist. Quiet and clean environment. Know all the sore spots when you just tell them briefly the problem u have. 1st try out an hour of foot reflexology then immediately add on another session of body n leg. Left happily. Price is reasonable and staff is friendly.

Today was my second trip with a week and tried this shop for both foot and body massage . Both me and my wife are Very impressed with the masseuse skill !
Will definitely visit this place again !
Price is ok , ambient is nice and staff are polite and skillful .
Strongly recommended .
Good massage treatment. Reasonable prices. But Would be grateful if therapist is sick to wear a mask. 🙏🙏🙏
skilled therapists (special shoutout to amy and alan) and reasonable pricing! really enjoy their massages ☺️
For SG, the staff were all very skillful. They do know how to massage on the right points to release that “酸痛” price wise is definitely affordable for SG location in the neighbourhood. Legit good.
